name: GIRLBALLS
description:
GIRLBALLS FEATURES:

  • Ball shooting
  • Ball sucking
  • 3 enemy types
  • 4 secret PERFECT FORM upgrades to unlock

GIRLBALLS CONTROLS:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move. There's no turning back in "GIRLBALLS."
  • Left mouse click to select upgrades.
  • Your brain to create an emotional response to "GIRLBALLS."

GIRLBALLS PRAYER:

  • Girl balls. Girl balls. Girl balls. Girl balls. Girl balls. Girl balls. Girl balls. Girl balls.

Sound effects from www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
